scripts.gen-proto-ts-files: pbjs -t static-module -w commonjs -o generatedProto/compiled.js ../proto/messages.proto && pbts -o generatedProto/compiled.d.ts generatedProto/compiled.js
scripts.reset-kafka-raw-trade-event-parser-offse: docker exec -it stock-market-kafka-0 /opt/bitnami/kafka/bin/kafka-consumer-groups.sh --bootstrap-server kafka-0:9092 --group raw_trade_event_parser --reset-offsets --to-earliest --topic sorted_raw_trade_data --execute
